caption: It all began with a map. On this map were castles and trees, all constructed from building blocks. They appeared to be expanding, with the castles growing taller and the trees getting larger.Then, the perspective shifted to the top of a city wall. Two people engaged in a fierce duel, evenly matched in their combat skills. At a higher vantage point, a small king was surrounded by a group of people, watching the duel. The little king didn't seem too pleased, and beside him, another girl was comforting him.Following this, an older-looking individual approached with a cup of wine, engaging in a conversation with the young king. He seemed to be an elder or mentor figure, and their conversation appeared amicable.
